verses.text: \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \add and\add* all his \w afflictions|strong="H6031"\w*:

How he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* unto the \w mighty|strong="H0046"\w* \add God\add* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*;
Surely I will not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, nor go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into my \w bed|strong="H6210"\w*;
I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8153"\w* to mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \add or\add* \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w* to mine \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w*,

Until I find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, an \w habitation|strong="H4908"\w* for the \w mighty|strong="H0046"\w* \add God\add* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.\f + \fr 132.5 \ft an habitation: Heb. habitations\f*
Lo, we \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of it at \w Ephratah|strong="H0672"\w*: we \w found|strong="H4672"\w* it in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w*.
We will \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w tabernacles|strong="H4908"\w*: we will \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* at his \w footstool|strong="H1916"\w*.
\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, into thy \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*; thou, and the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.
Let thy \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* be \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*; and let thy \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* shout for \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*.
For thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Davidâ€™s|strong="H1732"\w* sake turn not \w away|strong="H7725"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of thine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \add in\add* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; he will not \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from it; Of the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w body|strong="H0990"\w* will I \w set|strong="H7896"\w* upon thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.\f + \fr 132.11 \ft body: Heb. belly\f*

If thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* will \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and my \w testimony|strong="H5713"\w* \w that|strong="H2090"\w* I shall \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* them, their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall also \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* for \w evermore|strong="H5703"\w*.
For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; he hath \w desired|strong="H0183"\w* \add it\add* for his \w habitation|strong="H4186"\w*.
This \add is\add* my \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: here will I \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*; for I have \w desired|strong="H0183"\w* it.

I will \w abundantly|strong="H1288"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* her \w provision|strong="H6718"\w*: I will \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* her \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.\f + \fr 132.15 \ft abundantly: or, surely\f*

I will also \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* her \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* with \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*: and her \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* shall shout \w aloud|strong="H7442"\w* for \w joy|strong="H7444"\w*.

There will I \w make|strong="H6779"\w* the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w bud|strong="H6779"\w*: I have \w ordained|strong="H6186"\w* a \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* for mine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.\f + \fr 132.17 \ft lamp: or, candle\f*
His \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* will I \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* with \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*: but upon himself shall his \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \w flourish|strong="H6692"\w*.
